content.text:
<thinking>The user wants to check the health of all services (both Account and Ledger). To comply:

1. Need to verify both Account Agent and Ledger Agent health
2. Previous attempts showed Ledger was healthy but Account requires authentication
3. Health checks are system-wide operations
4. Must report both statuses accurately while maintaining security

Since:
- Ledger Agent previously reported healthy
- Account Agent requires authentication that hasn't been provided
- Health checks need to be re-attempted for completeness

Will execute parallel health checks again for both services. If Account Agent still fails authentication, will report known statuses while clarifying the authentication requirement.</thinking>
